Room.Name: Steaming Jungle Trail
Room.ShortDescription: This is a hot and humid path leading through dense jungle brush.
Room.LongDescription: It's almost impossible to step off the path to either side because of the thick, wet brush. Low ferns and young palms grow everywhere, and tall banana trees hang ripe with fruit. Ancient trees, covered with moss and vines, stand tall and obscure the light. The path is dim and hard to see, and twists around frequent obstacles.
